ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record Yes if all eligibility criteria were met at the time the subject was enrolled. Record No if subject did not meet all criteria at the time the subject was enrolled.

ReferenceDocuments.name: N/A
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does not map to an SDTMIG variable. The SDTM Annotated CRF is annotated to indicate that this field is NOT SUBMITTED.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: The intent/purpose of collecting this field is to help with data cleaning and monitoring. It provides verification if all other fields on the CRF were deliberately left blank.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Equivalent CDE
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is to be used for CDISC aligned data collection in place of CDE 1235 from the original NCI Standard CRF Template.
